solution_line_template: If Alex has {alex_pens_week1} pens in the first week of a month, she will have {alex_pens_week1}*{doubling_factor} = <<{alex_pens_week1}*{doubling_factor}={alex_pens_week2}>>{alex_pens_week2} pens in the second week.
After her pen collection doubles in the third week, Alex will have {doubling_factor}*{alex_pens_week2} = <<{doubling_factor}*{alex_pens_week2}={alex_pens_week3}>>{alex_pens_week3} pens.
In the last week of the month, Alex will have {doubling_factor}*{alex_pens_week3} = <<{doubling_factor}*{alex_pens_week3}={alex_pens_week4}>>{alex_pens_week4} pens after her pen collection.

If Jane has {jane_pens_after_month} pens after a month, Alex will have {alex_pens_week4}-{jane_pens_after_month} = <<{alex_pens_week4}-{jane_pens_after_month}={alex_more_than_jane}>>{alex_more_than_jane} more pens than Jane.
